description: Musico is an AI-driven software engine that generates music. It can react to gesture, movement, code or other sound
title: Musico - AI generative music
introduction: Musico is an AI-driven software engine that generates music by blending traditional and modern machine learning algorithms. It offers endless streams of copyright-free music in various styles and empowers creators with autonomous, original, and adaptive music composition.
features: AI-ASSISTED COMPOSITION: Generate melodies, beats, and harmonies with autonomy and responsiveness.
AUGMENTED PERFORMANCE: Control music generation in real-time with intuitive gestures.
GUIDED SOUND GENERATION: Real-time mapping and reaction to control signals for interactive music creation.
AUTO-SCORING FOR DIGITAL STORYTELLING AND MEDIA: Develop soundtracks for storytelling, games, and cross-media projects.
Engine: Combinatory algorithms and machine learning for music generation.
Apps: Innovative tools for AI-assisted music production and real-time performance.
Demos: Listen to tracks created with Musico.
Human Supervision: Dedicated human supervision for consistent and valuable results in AI generative music.
targetPeople: Music professionals and non-musicians interested in AI-generated music

faqs.question: What is Musico?
faqs.answer: Musico is an AI-driven software engine that generates music using a blend of traditional and modern machine learning algorithms.

faqs.question: What are the features of Musico?
faqs.answer: Musico offers AI-assisted composition, augmented performance, guided sound generation, and auto-scoring for digital storytelling and media.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from Musico?
faqs.answer: Musico is suitable for music professionals and non-musicians looking for innovative ways to create and apply music.
